name: Nandipha
description: Software Developer and Enthusiastic Tutor with a Diploma in Software Development (2025) - Eager to Empower and Inspire Through Technology Education.
aboutDescription: Hello! I'm Nandipha Maholwana, a passionate and aspiring software developer currently pursuing my studies in Software Development. My journey in the world of coding started with a curiosity about how things work behind the scenes in the digital world, and it has since grown into a full-fledged passion.

education.degree: Diploma in IT and Software Development
